== Sarzora (626914) ==
      
Sarzora is a village in the [[Salcete]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 769 hectares and harbouring 605 households with total population of 2270 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[CUNCOLIM]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 1000 and female population is 1270. Scheduled Caste Population is 63 and Scheduled Tribes population is 267. Census Location Code of the village is 626914<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
